column2: "Thanks a bunch! There's nothing more summer than running along a hot, sandy beach! Don't you agree? What do you think, Matoi?"
"Yes, it was a lot of fun! The sun shining on the sea is so beautiful! How about you, Harriet?"
"Do not worry about me! Thanks to your miraculous \"sunscreen\", I have been having fun with no risk of my skin being burned! What a wonderful ointment!"
